meanings.definition: In a private manner or way.
meanings.sent1: She whispered privately to her friend during the movie.
meanings.sent2: They spoke privately in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat privately snuck up on the unsuspecting mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun set privately behind the mountains, painting the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The old man privately reminisced about his youth, lost in memories of days gone by.

meanings.definition: Not open to or shared with others.
meanings.sent1: The diary was kept privately hidden under her bed.
meanings.sent2: He had a privately owned collection of rare coins.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel privately hoarded acorns in its secret stash.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a privately locked chest, guarding her deepest emotions.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a privately cultivated paradise, known only to its owner.

meanings.definition: In a way that is not public or known by others.
meanings.sent1: The artist worked privately in his studio, away from prying eyes.
meanings.sent2: She smiled privately, knowing a secret no one else did.
meanings.sent3: The magician privately practiced his tricks before the big show.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed privately through the secluded valley, untouched by civilization.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was buried privately under the old oak tree, waiting to be discovered.
